column2: eing aggrieved by the said conviction the Accused has appealed to this court.

column1: The following are the grounds of appeal as per the written submission:

column2: The  learned  High  Court  Judge  had  failed  to  consider  the  discrepancies  in  the
evidence tendered by the witnesses of the prosecution.
The learned High Court Judge had attached probative value to the evidence of the
1st   Witness, especially regarding the identity of the accused despite the omission
and contradiction of her (1st    Witness's) evidence, misdirected herself (the learned
